timeline.bodyText: @hao1st Are we at a point where these can become capabilities so we're not exposing role names to the GUI? Or is the plan to take care of that in a separate refactoring ticket?
timeline.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText:
@rjrudin I just created a task to remove role names as login response once the UI does not use roles any more.
https://project.marklogic.com/jira/browse/DHFPROD-4583
replies.author: hao1st

timeline.bodyText: this should equal 0. Collection radio box is checked by default so srcQuery input div will be hidden
timeline.author: bsrikan

timeline.bodyText: Is the assumption that this role will allow access to either match or merge configurations? If so, the description should state that.
timeline.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText: Thanks @rjrudin . I have changed the description.
